more_content_localized.en:
Sunbathing in the sand and swimming in the sea is a steadfast way to enjoy Barcelona’s famous beaches, but for those looking to kick it up a notch, watersports bring an element of excitement to exploring the famous coastline. Make your trip to the Mediterranean memorable with Barcelona’s top five water sports. 

1. Parasailing

http://corsanautica.com/titulaciones_nauticas.html

Why discover Barcelona by foot when you can take in all of its majesty from above? Corsa Nautica offers an unforgettable parasailing adventure above Barceloneta Beach’s vast sands and historical boardwalk. Begin by cruising in a speedboat on calm waters, then strap in and fly tandem with up to three friends or family members for a stunning 15-minute flight.

2. Windsurfing

https://www.velabarcelona.com/

Looking for more adrenaline? Learn to windsurf at Nova Icària beach with a 2.5-hour lesson led by expert instructors. Perfect for beginners, Vela Barcelona provides you with all the skills and equipment needed to sail the serene Mediterranean waters and take in crisp ocean air.

3. Jet Skiing

http://corsanautica.com/titulaciones_nauticas.html

Speed over the smooth waters of Barcelona with a 20-60-minute exhilarating jet ski experience. Under the supervision of an expert instructor, you’ll surf the open sea and take in the sandy shorelines of Bogatell and Nova Icària beaches. And when you’re ready for a break, jump off and take a dip in the Mediterranean!

4. Paddle Boarding and Kayaking

https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g187497-d5773067-Reviews-Vela_Barcelona-Barcelona_Catalonia.html

Soak in the sun and embrace warm Mediterranean water with a 2.5-hour paddle board and kayak adventure on the breathtaking beaches of Nova Icària. An expert instructor equips you with the basics of each watersport and then supervises as you take to sea.

5. Luxury Powerboat Ride

https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g187497-d7913394-Reviews-Barcelona_Watersports-Barcelona_Catalonia.html

With a qualified instructor at helm, sit back and take in Barcelona’s beautiful coastline from the comfort of a luxury powerboat. In between high-speed blasts and coastal cruising, the boat will also drop anchor, allowing optimal time for tanning and swimming. End the experience with a smooth cruise past extravagant yachts and the charming seaside arena.
